commands.description: Build a Docker container with a given tag from a specified location

placeholders.name: <tag-name>
placeholders.description: Tag name you want to give your Docker container

placeholders.name: <location>
placeholders.description: Location where your Dockerfile is located

commands.description: Run a Docker container in detached mode

placeholders.name: <host-port>
placeholders.description: Port on the host to bind to

placeholders.name: <image-name>
placeholders.description: Name of the Docker image to run

placeholders.name: <container-id>
placeholders.description: ID of the Docker container to stop

commands.description: Pull a Docker image from a registry

placeholders.name: <image-name>
placeholders.description: Name of the Docker image to pull

commands.description: Remove a Docker image from the local storage

placeholders.name: <image-name>
placeholders.description: Name of the Docker image to remove

commands.description: Fetch the logs of a Docker container
Execute an interactive bash shell on the running container
